name: City Bound
description:
You only have a small taxi, but too many guests.

Pick them all up and toss them behind your car! They will join together as a congaline until they arrive at their desired location.

But if you drop some one off the guests in the chain behind them will get stranded!

Drop off as many guests as you can before the timer runs out!

Mac Version is completely untested.

Web version is ... not recommended. Physics in browsers are wonky.

Control:
Arrow Keys steer your car

Up to Accelerate, Left and Right to steer

Escape to Exit

Sources:
Uses Modern City Top Down Tilset for some tiles.

All other sprites are made by us.

Uses Raccoon Pixel Font
